Summaries.eng:
"Pucca" is a TV series based on a Flash animation series published by Vooz Character Systems.  It follows the trails and exploits of a South Korean girl named Pucca who is insanely in love with a prideful ninja named Garu.  Meanwhile, Garu and Pucca help their town of Sooga Village out when evil ninjas attack, as well as diffuse a lot of the absurd situations that frequently plague the town.  This show could best be described as a cleaned-up version of South Park meets Looney Tunes meets Naruto.  

There is some very subtly hidden adult humor; but most of the adult jokes would not go noticed by small children, who are the primary audience.
Garu tries to save the village by stopping an erupting volcano.
The chefs attempt to make a noodle that goes around the world.
Garu and Abyo aim to win the ping-pong tournament, even against Tobe's tricks, although they might need a little help from Pucca.
Tobe witnesses the magic powers of Won's eggs.
The Chefs try to regain their honor while Pucca watches the restaurant.
Pucca and her friends enter Garu's booby-trapped ninja house.
Garu receives a cursed tie on his birthday.
The Vagabonds cast a spell to give Garu chicken pox and make him act like a chicken, but it works too well, as everyone in Sooga Village catches chicken pox.
Pucca gives Garu a giant flower that eats anything and anyone in sight.
Garu shrinks himself to get away from Pucca, but being small puts him in even more trouble than he bargained for.
The kite festival in Sooga Village goes haywire when Tobe & his gang show up.
Abyo tries to make his acting debut and Pucca foils it by chasing Garu.
It's Halloween until Pucca scares Garu's skeleton out of him and is on the run.
A haunted picture with a ghost version of Pucca starts haunting Garu.
Ching becomes evil from Doga's sock and blames her rampage on Pucca.
Abyo and Garu are capture in a pocket change-eating sofa.
Tobe and his ninjas plan to destroy Garu in a winter cold battle.
It's Pucca's birthday until Garu tries to keep her busy.
The citizens of Sooga Village have a Rickshaw race for a special prize.
Pucca plans to marry Garu in the night mall.
Garu and Abyo go on a fishing trip until a giant fish attacks them.
Pucca dreams about Garu until Tobe starts turning it into a nightmare.
Tobe uses Pucca's Scooter to make a weapon to battle Garu.
Tobe kidnaps Yani in order to lure Garu and Mio into a trap.
Pucca becomes invisible and starts scaring the citizens.
Tobe gets hit by lightning and becomes more powerful.
Garu and Tobe get arrested and Pucca tries different ways of seeing Garu while he's in jail.
Christmas comes to Sooga Village and everyone's presents are stolen by a stranger seeking revenge on an old nemesis.
The northern lights go out at Iglooga Village and Garu must find a way to fix them before the snow beast can destroy the village.
The citizens of Sooga Village line up to see Santa not knowing that it is really Tobe in disguise.
Pucca and Ching enter a world where their friends are Wild West characters.
The Vagabonds tried to make Pucca late in order to get their food free.
Abyo steals a manual that Pucca created to make love ninja moves.
Abyo shows off his moves until his face slips off of him.
A Swiss girl falls in love with Garu until Pucca tries to save him.
The Vagabonds take over a circus until Garu and Pucca play along.
Muji's zombies kidnap the Baby New Year in order to ruin New Year's Eve.
Muji steals the Endless supply of Noodles from Space Station Sooga.
Ring Ring tries to sabotage Pucca's party after not inviting her.
Pucca accidentally spins the gang on a merry-go-round back in time.
Tobe forces the creator of Fortune cookies to create one that can destroy Garu.
While playing in the ice, Tobe tries to make Garu sink in the icy water.
Garu goes to the movies with Pucca but she wants him to watch a love story.
The chefs go on strike and the village goes on a Ja Jang Noodle famine.
The citizens have a costume dance party until Tobe and his gang try to crash it.
Tobe gets hits by one of Cupid's arrows and falls in love with Chief.
Ching tries to make Abyo her boyfriend until Muji kidnaps her.
A famous celebrity tries to charm Pucca and Garu decides to help him.
Garu gets a broken leg and is sent to the hospital.
The citizens of Sooga enjoy a beach party until Muji tries to wreck it.
Abyo becomes a superhero until he starts arresting the citizens.
The Chefs create a singing contest as an ad for their restaurant.
Tobe plans on destroying Garu while he's asleep.
The Chefs of the Goh-Wong fight over a girl.
Garu gives Pucca a bell in order to escape from her
Muji challenges Garu in order to keep a Syrup geyser.
Garu can't get an autograph until Pucca tries to get it for him.
The boys create their own tree house and don't invite the girls.
Garu goes to Spain for the running of the bulls until Tobe gets involved.
Garu creates a clone and it becomes his own talking person.
Pucca and the gang visit Tokyo, Japan.
Tobe tricks Garu into taking tests for a Ninja License.
Spicy food turns the gingerbread people into fire-breathing creatures.
Ring Ring tries to sabotage Pucca's supermodeling career.
Pucca and the Chefs search for Garu of the Jungle until Tobe tries to capture him.
Stress-out Abyo heads toward Ssoso's temple for inner peace.
Tobe travels inside Garu in order to defeat him.
Puccahontas tries to help Garunimo in his tests.
The chefs battle a Texan couple for their honor of the Goh-Wong.
Pucca and Ring Ring are in a contest for Garu's attention.
Garu and Tobe compete in the Olympic games.
The gang tries to catch Mio to take him to the vet.
An Australian man finds Garu and keeps him like a son.
Pucca's creates a sweater for Garu to wear on his mountain climb.
Muji tries to shave the Dugong's moustache until Pucca gets involved.
Dada becomes a ladies man and Ring Ring loves him.
Garu travels to deliver an urn by train until Tobe tries to steal it.
Tobe tries to take over Holland with an automotive windmill.
Ring Ring plans to become the most beautiful girl in Egypt.
Master Soo bans Kung Fu and Marital Arts from the village.
Tobe plans to defeat Garu in a court of law.
Tobe plans to sink the Gigantic with Garu in it.
Garu discovers that his day is happening over and over.
Samba of Doom: Tobe plans to sabotage the Samba dance contest.
Doga fish-naps all the merpeople of the ocean.
Tobe seeks advice from Heil Kick Yu.
A golden dragon kidnaps Pucca.
The Vagabonds bring a plague of termites to the village
Dada quits his job as a janitor and becomes a wrestler.
The balance of Yin and Yang has gone screwy.
Tex Lugie and Sloppy Sue return with an SUV factory.
Garu's astral self travels to learn the secret of enlightenment.
Doga moves in the Goh-wong and gives the chefs a hard time.
The chefs have been kidnapped during a convention in Las Vegas.
Secret Agent Abyo follows clues to the chefs' whereabouts.
Abyo and the gang encounter the mastermind in the kidnappings.
Ring Ring wants to have more merit badges than Pucca.
Pucca gets a flu, and the soup that will cure her calls for lava peppers. While Ho is getting them, a fire goddess falls in love with him.
A laundry accident causes Garu and Tobe to be stuck together.
Garu travels to India to find Swami Soo until Pucca pursues him.
Pucca is shocked to see Garu in love with Ring Ring until she finds out its Dada in a mask.
Chief possesses the wise turtle's glasses, making her a genius so she can impress Tobe.
Ching and Ring Ring battle as Cheerleaders.
Tobe fires his ninjas until they go looking for another job.
Kua returns with the chefs to find the essence of 1,000 moons.
Abyo becomes a fashion model until Ching gets jealous.
Muji creates a zombified Pucca bride.
Pucca uses the full moon to release Garu's love side.
Ring Ring splits herself from her "bad" side.
The vagabonds try to steal cans from a food drive.
Garu Hood must rescue the noodle bowl and Dada.
Won falls in love with a Cuckoo bird and leaves with it but makes Ching feel weak and powerless.
Both Santa and Doga get the wrong kind of batteries.
Pucca and her friends become superheroes and battle Master Soo's brother Mel when he wants revenge on the village for forgetting about him.
Ring Ring travels back to the past and erases Garu from history.
Garu falls into a run-away magician's hat, leaving Pucca to chase it all over Sooga Village.
Master Soo's brother Loo makes fun of his old age and steals his maidens from him.
